summary: An overhaul to the books featuring improved textures and corrected titles for better sorting.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#5999A9][size=7]Books of Skyrim[/size][/color]
Overhauling the books to feature some improved textures
plus expanded content for your reading pleasure.[/center]

[color=#6699CC][size=2]Dawnguard and Dragonborn may be required.[/size][/color]

I\'d like to expand the content of books by a few pages, basing the content on established Elder Scrolls lore.
If you would like to collaborate on this project, please contact me. You will be credited for your work.


This mod aims to add immersion to the literature of Skyrim. The goal is not to drastically change the look of the vanilla
books but simply to improve the texture resolution and detail while adding several unique new covers.

I\'ve noticed that some of the vanilla books were mixed up. In some cases the world model used a different
texture than the inventory model. I\'ve corrected this in most instances and improved some textures.
If you notice any problems or have some suggestions, please let me know.


[color=#6699CC][size=3]Features and updates[/size][/color]
Glossiness corrected and improved journal covers added.
Textures have been modestly improved.

Some Dawnguard and Dragonborn books have received unique covers.

Per request, titles of books and alchemy recipes have been edited for better sorting.

Several unique book covers added.

Sets have matching book covers and corrected titles. Note: Some skill books will be inconspicuous.

[b]Lusty Argonian Maid and other books may contain mature content.[/b]


If you are also using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29934]Economy Overhaul[/url], this needs to be loaded [i]after[/i] SEO.


Please check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=19752]UDO[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18827]Dark Assassin Armor[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29934]Economy Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17666]Follower and NPC Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18032]Hadrian\'s Lair[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=19192]Genom Races[/url]
author: EnigManic
